statements: SELECT * FROM historical_data;
SELECT project_name, completion_year FROM historical_data WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, project_type FROM historical_data WHERE completion_year > 2000 ORDER BY completion_year DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT architectural_style FROM historical_data;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_type FROM historical_data WHERE completion_year BETWEEN 1990 AND 2000;
SELECT project_id, project_name, completion_year FROM historical_data WHERE project_type = 'Residential' ORDER BY completion_year DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT project_id, project_name, completion_year, project_type FROM historical_data WHERE completion_year > 2000 AND architectural_style = 'Modern'
SELECT project_id, project_name, completion_year, project_type, architectural_style FROM historical_data WHERE project_type = 'Commercial' ORDER BY project_id LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE architectural_style IN ('Baroque', 'Art Deco')
SELECT project_id, project_name, architectural_style FROM historical_data WHERE completion_year <= 1975 ORDER BY project_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM architects;
SELECT architect_name, architect_specialization FROM architects ORDER BY architect_experience DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT architect_name, architect_experience FROM architects WHERE architect_specialization = 'Historic Preservation';
SELECT project_name, completion_date FROM historical_data ORDER BY completion_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM architects WHERE architect_specialization = 'Interior Design';
SELECT architect_name, architect_specialization FROM architects ORDER BY architect_experience DESC;
SELECT AVG(architect_experience) FROM architects;

SELECT architects.architect_name, historical_data.project_name FROM architects JOIN historical_data ON architects.architect_id = historical_data.architect_id WHERE historical_data.completion_date > '2020-01-01';

SELECT architect_name, architect_specialization, COUNT(historical_data.project_name) AS project_count FROM architects LEFT JOIN historical_data ON architects.architect_id = historical_data.architect_id GROUP BY architects.architect_name, architects.architect_specialization;
SELECT * FROM architects WHERE architect_specialization = 'Urban Planning';
SELECT architect_name, architect_specialization FROM architects WHERE architect_experience_years > 10;
SELECT * FROM historical_projects ORDER BY historical_project_location DESC;
SELECT architect_name, architect_experience_years FROM architects WHERE architect_specialization = 'Interior Design';
SELECT * FROM future_design_decisions WHERE decision_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM architects ORDER BY architect_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT architect_name, architect_specialization FROM architects WHERE architect_experience_years > 10

SELECT architects.architect_name, historical_projects.historical_project_name FROM architects INNER JOIN historical_projects ON architects.architect_id = historical_projects.historical_project_architect_id
SELECT * FROM future_design_decisions WHERE decision_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_architects FROM architects
SELECT * FROM historical_projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, completion_year FROM historical_projects ORDER BY completion_year DESC;
SELECT architect_name, project_name FROM historical_projects WHERE completion_year > 2000;
SELECT * FROM design_decisions WHERE approved = TRUE;
SELECT project_id, decision_date, decision_description FROM design_decisions ORDER BY decision_date;
SELECT project_id, project_name, completion_year FROM historical_projects;
SELECT * FROM design_decisions WHERE approved = TRUE;
SELECT architect_name, experience_years FROM project_architects ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT * FROM project_types WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT project_name, architect_name, project_type, completion_year FROM historical_projects JOIN project_architects ON historical_projects.architect_name = project_architects.architect_name;
SELECT * FROM architects WHERE experience_years > 5;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM projects WHERE budget > 50000;
SELECT name, specialization FROM architects WHERE specialization = 'Interior Design';
SELECT * FROM design_decisions ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, analysis_date, analysis_summary FROM projects JOIN analysis_results ON projects.id = analysis_results.project_id;
SELECT * FROM architects ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT id, name, specialization FROM architects WHERE experience_years > 5;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM projects WHERE budget > 10000 ORDER BY start_date;

SELECT architects.name, projects.project_name, analysis_results.analysis_summary FROM architects JOIN projects ON architects.id = projects.id JOIN analysis_results ON projects.id = analysis_results.project_id;

SELECT design_decisions.description, historical_data.design_changes FROM design_decisions INNER JOIN historical_data ON design_decisions.project_id = historical_data.project_id WHERE design_decisions.decision_date > '2021-01-01';
